Notes: A flame that burns the player and other compatible objects upon contact. It can be extinguished using a Spin Attack.

Obj_arg0.Name: Item Type
Obj_arg0.Description: Specifies the item to be spawned after putting out the fire.

Obj_arg1.Name: Decorative?
Obj_arg1.Description: If set, the flame won't burn anything and it can't be extinguished.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

Group.Description: Groups other objects of the same kind. Special sound effects will be played when extinguishing the flames in this group.
